thread.title: OneCap Investment has nominated Mr. Ary Pernett to its Advisory Board

title: OneCap Investment has nominated Mr. Ary Pernett to its Advisory Board

organizations.name: institut national polytechnique de lorraine in nancy

text:
MONTREAL, May 02, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- OneCap Investment Corporation ("OneCap or the â€œCorporation") (TSX VENTURE:OIC) is pleased to announce the nomination of Mr. Ary Fernando Pernett Marquez, to its Advisory Board.
Born and raised in Colombia, Mr Pernett graduated in mining from the University of Medellin in Colombia and obtained a Ph.D. in Geology from the Institut national polytechnique de Lorraine in Nancy, France in 1978. Mr. Pernett has been involved in all aspects of gold mining from exploration to production and marketing in Colombia and Mexico. He also worked for the Mining Department of Colombia and for the University of Medellin.
For the past 10 years, Mr Pernett has dedicated all his time and effort in the Bolivar province of Colombia where he owns mining concessions and artisanal gold mining operations.
"We are pleased to see Ary joining our team at OneCap. His experience and understanding of the mining sector in Columbia and the appreciation he received from the small gold miners in Bolivar, will provide invaluable knowledge to OneCap" commented Jean Depatie, Chairman of the Board.
About OneCap
OneCap is a mineral exploration company with its exploration activities focused in Colombia.
